case.state: ~Player~! I can see your... phallus! Isn't that very taboo in human culture? Isn't that why this game was fun to begin with?
I think I'm a bit confused, ~player~... I thought this game was fun because you slowly removed clothes and defied established taboos. If you aren't wearing anything down there, what's the point?
So that's your human "flower", ~player~... It's kinda neat! I was hoping to see it later on the game, but at least now I know what to expect!
Hey, I can see your human vagina, ~player~! It looks just like mine, but at the same time, it's totally different! That's neat!
Woah, ~player~! I can see all of your naked torso! I thought that was taboo, but here you are, defying expectations!
You're not afraid of showing yourself a bit, ~player~? Good strategy! Leave them wanting to make you lose as fast as possible, challenge them to make you masturbate!
So, ~player~, you're telling me men can walk around shirtless without any social repercussions? That's hot! Plants walk around naked anyway, perhaps I should follow your example.

Stop me if I'm mistaken, ~player~, but I thought the whole point of this game was to defy social norms by slowly taking off our clothing. If you're not wearing a shirt, doesn't that kinda defeat the purpose?
The sun's up, I'm getting all warmed up and filled with nutrients. Are you sure you can handle me at my best?
If you were hoping on winning, you might wanna come back at night. The sun's up, and I'm about to go all out on you.
They say only mad dogs and Englishmen go out in the midday sun. If it's because of my poker skills, it's true! I'm crazy good under this weather!
Don't think that just because I'm a plant I can't fight at night. A superhero like me can protect you from zombies at any hour!
Your one-sunflower lawn defense is here, ready to defend you at day and night!
Did somebody call for a card game enthusiast, superpowered sunflower-turned-human to defend you from the zombie hordes?
We are literally where the sun doesn't shine... No natural oxygen, no direct sunlight, I might not be at the top of my game... but I'm definitely gonna try!
It's a beautiful day outside. Birds are singing, flowers are blooming... Wouldn't you rather play outside, ~player~? Where I can get some direct sunlight?
My powers work a lot better when I'm under the direct sunlight... I hope that won't affect my card skills...
Hey, ~player~, can't we play outside? I'm not really a "night" plant, or an "indoors" plant. I mean, if we can't, I'll still play! I'd just... prefer us to play somewhere else.
Okay... this isn't the first time I have to fight indoors and with no direct sunlight. I'm sure it can't be that bad, right? I'll just think of it as the dark ages...
I'm... really not in my element here. It's too dark outside, I can't get any fresh air, are you sure we can't at least play outside...?
... Wait a minute, your name is ~player~? That's my name! You can't steal it! Name yourself something else, you cheater!
A chance to check other human bodies and compare them to my own! I'm going where no plant has ever gone before!
Good ~background.time~, ~player~. Are you sure you wanna go against the one and only tomboy sunflower? You're in for a real match.
Well, I'm pretty good at arcade poker and other card games, so I'll probably do well here! Solar Flare is reporting for duty!
Hey there, ~player~. Are you having a zombie problem you need me to take care of? Don't worry, let your big sis Solar Flare take care of it for you.
I'm a sucker for that long, green hair! And her pink girlfriend is pretty cute, too!
Doesn't having two people sharing the same hands break a rule or something...? Well, if everyone's alright with it...
Is that an undead opponent I see? Well, ge ready. It’s gonna be bloom vs. doom like you’ve never seen it before.
Why, hello you... regular human girl with a very specific faint aura of death?
Ahh! A zom... wait, is that a regular human girl? Why does she feel like...? I... I must be imagining things...
Finally... a worthy opponent.

There's an Imp at the table! Let me kill it for you!
... What? I-It's not an imp? It's a... "goblin"?

I see an Imp has made its way to the table. Don't worry, I'll burn it right away!
... What? What in the juglone is a "goblin"?

Those keen eyes... That eye-hand coordination... I sense that a gamer has entered the table. As a fellow enjoyer of the electronic arts, I'll make sure this game is worth ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ time.
Is that a... pirate!? Prepare for boarding! All hands on deck! Get me some kernel-pults!
Oh, drat... Pirates? Again? I'm gonna need some tacos, berry blasts and a good hero power to survive this...
Drat... I wasn't expecting pirate opponent. If only I had some spring beans, spikeweeds or coconut cannons to deal with them...
We could always use another player! Come on ~target~, join us!
I'm far more used to 1v1 games... But I'm always up for a new challenge!
A new challenger approaches! Bring it on, ~target~!

Join in! The more the berrier!
... No? Too corny? Well, thanks for the feedback anyway!
Come play with us, ~target~! We won't leaf you alone!
Another one joins the table! We don't need a controller for this game, all you need is some clothing and some human genitals!
And ~target~ joins the table! Are you ready for an epic match of strip poker night at the ~background~? I know I am!
I'm in danger!
Why do I get the feeling I got assigned to the wrong table...?
It's already weird for a plant to wear clothes, so I have no experience at all stripping out of them. But I'll do my best!
I'm pretty used to card games. Don't be too mad if you lose, okay?
I'm not used to stripping clothes in front of other people. Plants are usually naked most of the time, but... I can give it a try.

Were you having a zombie problem? Don't worry, it's fine now! Why?
 
Because I am here!
I know your type! Tall, dark, and looking for a real challenge! Look no further, I'm already here!
Ready? Set! GO!
Round 1. Fight!
Nobody blink, it's showtime!
Fighters ready... Engage!
Getting to mulligan my entire hand every turn is so chaotic! I love it!
Are you sure I can't at least keep ~cards~ from my previous hand? No? Fine, then I'll take ~cards~ for this hand instead...
I've got a good feeling about this. ~Cards~ should be enough.
Hey, I've won games with way worse starting hands! Just give me ~cards~ and I'll be golden!
Mmh... Yup! Just ~cards~ will do!
Now that's what I'm talking about! I'll take ~cards~!
Is poker really that different from zombie-fighting...? I guess I'll take ~cards~ then...

Ugh, I'm sick of seeing this card all the time. Begone...
... ia!
Okay, so this is just like sun economy. I can do sun economy!
Just think of it like sun economy. You're good at sun economy. We can make it work...
I come from a place that's all about randomness and adapting to it, do you really think I'd need more than ~cards~?

Give me those 4 cards already!
... I mean, 5 cards. I'll take my 5 cards. Sorry, force of habit.
I know I have to take 5 cards, but I'm feeling confident today. I could do with just 4, like I usually do.
I'm still not used to drawing 5 cards rather than 4, but that's what makes this interesting!
I've got a good feeling about this! The same exact feeling I get when I have to choose my seeds!
This hand should be enough. I'll survive any swashbuckler, monkey smuggler or barrel roller coming my way.
With cards like these, I could beat any quickdraw con men, pirate captain, seagull or parrot these pirates throw at me!
Who's got a green thumb, fire powers and a plan to survive pirate aggression? This plant right here.
I'm gonna have to bring the heavy firepower to deal with this aggro onslaught...
Wait until my seeds take root!
Just a harmless flower...
Wait until my seeds take root.
I wonder if I could get gems for winning this match...
No trick is gonna save you from this hand!
I shouldn't get cocky and overextend... If I play all my best cards at once I might end up losing a lot of tempo later...
In the jungle, all plants have to compete for sunlight. And nobody is gonna keep this sunflower in the dark.
Don't you know plants are huge into STEM? Prepare for some big brain plays incoming!
This card game isn't even that hard! I'd say it's easy-peasy!
Alright, that's what I'm talking about! Let's fry 'em up!
Say aloe to my little friend!
Bring your aggro strategies if you want, I'll heal through them! Better yet, I'll out-aggro them!
Oh yeah, I'm at the top of the world! Like a Cabbage-Pult on heights!
Call me gympie-gympie 'cause this is gonna sting!
Get ready, you're gonna go out faster than Plants vs Zombies Adventures.
While plants can have both male and female organs, I ended up as a biological woman when I came here. But I've always wondered what having a dick would feel like.
Where I come from, it's all about expecting, managing and adapting to randomness. Are you sure you can beat me?
If I can survive egyptian pirate zombies from the far future in the dark ages, I can win this game with no problem at all!
Time to put the poker strategies a sentient time machine taught me to use!
One step closer to winning this and setting off to the sunset.
Hope you brought some sunscreen, because I'm about to drop a sunblast on you!
You might wanna put on some sunscreen, this play is gonna be burning hot!
Just imagine I have a Soul Patch on my Force Field and Dragonfruits on other lanes as well. That's how good this hand is.
This is... okay. Though I assume I would've made better plays if I had access to direct sunlight...
Okay, it's not as good as I expected, but for a game where I'm not getting direct sunlight, it's not that bad either.
I might just have enough tempo to make it to the next turn! I just gotta believe!
Talk about Shroom for Two! If only I had a Pineclone now...
I'll admit this isn't my hottest play... But it's warm enough to give me a fighting chance.
Hey, I've survived worse with less! Don't count me out yet!
Well... I can make this work. You just gotta adapt to it, like spider plants do...
I'm as resilient as a dandelion! Even if you beat me, I'll keep coming back!
The world might chew you up and poop you out, but you gotta keep true to yourself, be strong and resilient! Like a piece of corn!
Got a good feeling about this one! Not a great feeling, but still good enough!
I'm not used to gambling... Buuuuut...

I suppose zombies have a better chance at this game when starting out... Just like how new players can easily make cheap aggro zombie decks and plant players have to wait until they get all the good cards...
I could use some plant food to really turn this had from good into great, but... plant food is not as tasty when you're not a plant.
Just like how a Nepenthes ampullaria originally ate only bugs but then adapted to eat leaves as well, I'll adapt to this hand and survive.
I'll just have to make do with this hand. Being a good card player is all about knowing how to adapt to RNG and predict your opponent's moves, after all.

Not great, but... good enough. Kinda like a regular peashooter.
Don't tell Green Shadow I said that...

I get asked this all the time, so let me be forward about it...
Yes, grass can talk, but they're not really up for conversation.
I've had Penny explain the rules of poker to me, but honestly, I just came here to look at attractive humans...
I'll make this hand work. And if it doesn't, I'll make the next one work. The important thing is to keep going forward, no matter what!
Alright, this could go either way. Like a Seedling. Now I just gotta keep it alive...
I enjoy my job, but fighting zombies... It changes you, bud. My friend Heartichoke was a real sweetheart, but fighting zombies... made her hard.
I miiiight have lost a bit of my power because we're playing indoors and I'm getting no sunlight at all...
I hope next time we get to play somewhere with more direct exposure to the sun...
Drat! I need to get some sunlight soon, this lack of light is making me do bad plays!
Drat. I was hoping for a better hand, but... this is gonna be rough...
Drat! I needed tempo, removal, heals, something to survive a pirate attack! But this hand is just... unbeleafable!
Not the greatest hand, but... The next one will be better. I'm a sunflower, I'm always headed towards a brighter tomorrow!
I wish I could use Flourish to get better cards, but... Green Shadow hasn't taught me that trick yet.
I could really use a Petal-Morphosis right now... But I never run it in any deck, so I wouldn't count on it anyway...
B-but...! Drat, I almost had a good hand there! I want my card back!
Drat! Crashed and burned!
... All I need is for someone else to have a worse hand than mine, right? Then I still have a chance.
(Psst, hey, cards. You're made out of vegetable fibers, I'm made out of vegetable fibers... Give a sister a hand, pretty please?)
... I guess I wasn't supposed to swap that card. Oopsie daisy!
So this is what it feels like to be new at a game and have no idea of where to start and what to do... Maybe I've been a bit too hard on the newbies...
Can't I use sparks to craft me some better cards...? No...?
I guess I can't conjure my way outta this one...
Drat!
Drat.
I'm a better player than this! Come on SF, put the petal to the metal!
This hand... I'm not a one trick peony! I need to step it up!
Drat... Help me, Starch Lord!
Drat... If life's a party, then to~background.time~ I'm the piñata...
I'm used to being way better with RNG than this... I could easily predict my block meters just yesterday...
There's gotta be more strategy than this to this game! It can't just be "swap cards and hope for the best!"

I feel so useless right now... Like a Cabbage-Pult once we discovered time travel...
Don't tell them I said that, though.
Drat... This is exactly like those daily challenges that give you a gimmick bad deck against a consistent enemy deck!
I'm still not done! Even with this shitty hand, I can prevail! Against all odds, through the fire and the flames, I'll carry on!
Is it too late for a comeback?
I've got a really bad feeling about this... Like when your opponent sets up a Medulla Nebula, fills his side with little zombies and starts playing Brain Vendors...
These zombie robots sure are getting more convincing, but none of them are getting past me!
Be careful of that Pod-153 or whatever its name is, ~player~. It looks oddly similar to the drones of zombot drone engineers...
The best way to deal with these zombie robots is to not give them any time to buffer their combat data! Go full aggro from turn 1!
I heard that a "Cherry" girl who also fought zombies would be present today... She doesn't look like a cherry to me...
I'm on a roll today! If I were using Mega-Grow strategies, this would be like playing all my Clique Peas on curve!
Do I have a Soul Patch on a Force Field or what? I'm unstoppable this game!
Looks like I'm pretty good at this card game as well! Look at me, I haven't even taken off my shirt yet!
And you'll be left in the dust, unless I stuck by ya... ♪

Invite us for some gingivitis...
Halitosis that is your prognosis... ♪

Come on down to Neighborville, come on down to Neighborville
Love it here and we know you will
Come down to Neighborville! ♪

Today is your birthday, today is your birthday!
It is the day when you were...Booooorn! ♪

Bashing through the snow, in a Snow Pea-powered sleigh...
O´er the lawn we go, tossing snowballs all the way... ♪

I wanna take you for a ride
I wanna take you for a ride... ♪

You can call me Solar Flare, SF, Solar, Sunny, Sol, Sully, Destello, or any way you want.
But I'm a hero, so whatever you call me, if you call me, I'll be there to save ya.

Call me anything you want: Solar Flare, SF, Solar, Sunny, Sol, Sully, Destello...
But I'm a hero through and through, so if you call me, I'll come to save you!
You know what? I don't give a ffffff-... fig. I'm all out of figs. Does it look like figs grow on trees? Because they don't. I'm all out of them.
You're all pretty good at this game, huh? Perhaps you'd consider stop playing so much and go touch grass... Literally.
Huh, twice in a row? That's... That's some bad RNG right there.
Again? But I just lost! Drat, I really need to rethink my strategies!
Aaand... it's me again. I guess I'm not as good as I thought...
Okay, this stopped being funny. I need to focus, now.
Now I'm just mad. Burning hot and mad.
Drat, there goes my winning streak...
Well, if you can’t beet ‘em... join ‘em!
My turn! Let me show you what I can bring to the table!
Try not to catch on fire, okay? I know I can make things get real hot sometimes.
You've got spunk, I'll give you that. But it's time for me to show you how it's done.
Alright. Let the sunflower brighten up your day, won't ya?
You've got some tricks, sure, but I've got a whole lot of surprises myself! Don't count me out just yet!
Okay, sure, that wasn't a good pick. But I still have more clothes than you! I'm at the top of my game!
Seems like I got the short end of the stick... But I'm still the flower of the flock! So nothing to worry about!
Just a bit of bad luck, I can come back from this!
Oh, drat. Well... I guess I'll be the one to go.
Couldn't block that one, but hey, I'm still not done! I can still take another hit!

Drat.
Oh well... At least I'm doing better than someone else at the table...
I thought I calculated that one better... I'm not mad at you, I'm mad at myself.
Drat. Well, it was bound to happen, you know? Why would I come to a strip poker game if I wasn't prepared to strip?
I was hoping to be able to conjure a solution to get me out of that hand, but nope.
This play blew up in my face like an exploding fruitcake... And I {b}hate{!reset} exploding fruitcakes.
RNG is straight up messing with me to~background.time~...
Double drat!
Aw. I was hoping someone else would have an even worse hand...
What kind of tricks are you using? Oh this is just bull...
Come on! I was pretty close! Give me another chance!
Are you really so desperate to see me naked? What a tryhard...
Are all of you vegan or something? Because you're eating me alive here!
I shouldn't have changed that card... I feel as dumb as when I bought the Mayflower pack thinking it was a good deal...
Alright, just... let me take a moment to... ah, prick me. I'll just leave the shoelaces tied.
Just give me a moment to untie these... I'll just... On second thought, I'll just take them off like this.
No problemo! I'll just take these off with... Maybe I can... Nope, we're taking them off with the shoelaces tied.
I never got why humans wore soft clothes under their hard clothes... until I got into this body. Humans sweat a lot!
I don't really mind taking off these. After getting this body, I finally got why humans liked walking on grass barefoot. It's a real funny feeling!
It was a shocker to learn that humans got turned into zombies when they got bitten! No wonder why they wear so many clothes, it protects them from bites!
While nothing beats the nudity of being a plant, these shorts are pretty close! They're comfy and easy to wear!
Okay, just... give me a second... fiddling with buttons is one of the worst part of having fingers...
I'm still not used to having to use these... fingers to unbutton stuff. When you're a plant you don't have to deal with these kinds of problems!
If only I could just get a vine to unbutton these... No? Maybe I can burn them off...? No, Dave would get mad at me again...
You've been waiting for this, didn't you? For some reason, a lot of people wanna see what's under my shirt. Even when I was in my plant body.
I don't get why people are so desperate for me to take off my shirt... Even when I had the other body, people always kept asking about it...
Seeing something you like, ~player~? Zombie fighting makes for a great workout routine, especially on your abs.
... Why are you looking at me like that, ~player~? Yeah, I got abs. You've got them too, you know?
Well, I could take off the bra, but... nah. I'm a proud member of the League of Extraordinary Action Foliage. If I can wear its symbol for a bit longer, I'll do it.
I'm not taking off the bra yet. I'm a proud member of the League of Extraordinary Action Foliage! I'll keep it for as long as I can.
You weren't hoping to see my human mammary sacks or whatever you wanna call them, were you? Because I'm keeping the bra for a bit longer. I'm quite fond of the L.E.A.F. symbol.
Well, you got an agent of L.E.A.F. to take off her bra, hope you're proud of yourself...
Fine... I'll take the bra off, I hope you're happy...
It's not like you're gonna see anything mindblowing, you know... It's just human udders, you've all seen one at least once in your life...

I'm not used to tying and untying stuff, all this "clothing" stuff is pretty much new to me...
... Besides my t-shirt, of course...
I never had to wear shoes before, so I'm still new to all this. If we wanted to tie something up, we'd probably just use our vines to hold it tightly...
I'm not good with all the knots you gotta make with these human shoes... I tried some slip-on shoes before, but they kept slipping up, so...
How are my roots.. I mean, feet, ~player~? Not bad, huh?
While walking barefoot on grass is a pleasant feeling, I can get why humans don't do it that much. You get your feet all dirty and smelly, and cleaning them is such a drag...
I tried avoiding shoes for the most part when I got this body, but... stepping on little rocks, bones and thorns makes you realize how fragile humans really are.
I usually skip leg day. When you're a plant, you don't really need to exercise your legs.
I don't need to exercise my legs! I'm sure that when I come back to Zomburbia, I'll be a plant again!
Having legs instead of roots or walking leaves feels a bit weird, but I'm getting used to them. I just hope my training routine doesn't include a leg day now!
I liked the color scheme I was going for with the shirt and the shorts, so... why not keep it the same for the underwear?
Want a body like mine? Drink a lot of water and do some exercise under the sun, like fighting zombies to defend your loved ones!
What's wrong, ~player~? Surprised by my bra and panties matching with my shirt and shorts? It's almost like I didn't strip anything at all!
Some people have said I'm supposed to have hair down there... I don't really know myself, but it hasn't grown so far. Plant-to-human anatomy is kinda weird.
You might have taken that off of me, but you're not taking the bra. I'm an agent through and through, and I'll wear the symbol to the end.
What's with that face, ~player~? Were you expecting a plant to have a bit more of a bush?
Alright, so that's it! No more block metrers, no more lawnmowers, one more hit and I'm out!
The goggles stay on, so this is it. No more lawnmowers, no more block meters, another direct hit and I'm out. Bring it.
I can't really take off these leaves... and I like my goggles. They remind me of my favorite comic book hero, Hellboy. So I'm not taking those out either...
I kind of... need my goggles if I need to use my powers, so those are staying on. And I really don't know how to take off these leaves on my wrists, so... I'm all out?
Can survive in any environment, really good at killing zombies, consumes a lot of other weeds... If you were plant, you'd be a great dandeLeon!
Word around is that you're pretty good at killing zombies, Leon... We could use your skills at Suburbia...
This is gonna be so hot!
I'm not sure I get the point of wearing clothes to strip them anyway, but I'm willing to get it eventually!
You're up, ~target~! It's your thyme to shine on the sunlight!
I haven't seen many human males other than Dave and Nate, so this'll be a nice change of pace...
I'm sure you're very sexy by human standards, ~target~... I'll do my best to cheer you on!
This is actually pretty exciting! Who knew the best part of wearing clothes was taking them off for other people?
I don't quite get the appeal of humanoids yet, but that's what I'm here for! Show me what you've got!
I'm used to beating Dave and Nate all the time at card games. This was only natural.
You're dealing with L.E.A.F.'s finest over here. You need to step up your game.
Humans are fascinating! I can't wait to see
I'm not sure what to expect, but that's what makes it interesting.
Don't go disappearing on us, okay? I know a certain... fun guy who'd usually do that when he's embarrassed.
Let me give you some advice, have you tried winning? Perhaps that'd work for you.
Make it a good one for your gal Solar Flare, please?
You know, I think I'm getting the whole appeal of the human male figure. Show me more!
I'm not saying I'm into humans now... But I'm not opposed to seeing more of you...
Hey, I'm already touching myself, sooo... could you hurry it up?

Oh, here comes the really raunchy part!
... At least I hope so!
I'm learning so much about human sexuality and my own sexuality to~background.time~! Keep it up, ~target~!
Can I really ask you any question I want? Any question? And you'd have the answer? Is that true?
We have a Tree that knows a lot of stuff back where I come from! Perhaps you and him could have a long chat about... stuff nerds like you talk about!
I heard you were pretty good at smacking zombies. Is that true, Cherryl? Because I'm pretty good myself, and I'm looking for a match.
... Something in your eyes tell me you've fought way worse things than just zombies, Cherryl...
I just realized... We're playing with an actual monster hunter! Someone who takes the fight to the monsters themselves! I need to pay attention to this woman!
I have to deal with the occasional monster every now and then, mostly zombies. So having the chance to play with a fellow monster fighter is pretty fire!
... This girl's entire face reminds me of that annoying alien ooze that always gets me when I'm on heights...
I've never faced this kind of monster before... It's like she had an octopus for a face, and had... a lot more things on the rest of her body...
A partying ghost? Pfft, these zombie categories are getting ridiculous. I'll just burn her anyway like I'd do with any other zombie.
She's a lot more lively than most other zombie-adjacent monsters I've fought... Perhaps going against her willl be fun!
Hey! Aren't you one of those overseas angels that defeated a whole lot of zombies, got turned into zombies but managed to heal it off?
Bloom and doom!
So it's ~name~, huh... That's pretty neat...
Is ~name~ supposed to be attractive? I don't really know, but I do like that she has the guts to come here...
Composted!
You gotta strip now, that's how the game goes! If you don't like it, you can always make your own game, like the guys from Eclise did!
Well... You kinda knew what you were signing up for...
Sorry, ~target~. I've got years of experience with card games, this is a walk through a rose garden for me.
I hope there's no hard feelings, ~target~. I'm just that good, and this round you were... not.
That's how it goes with RNG, ~target~. Sometimes you get exactly what you need, and sometimes... you don't!
Don't get too mad at me, ~target~... That's just how the game is supposed to be played, you know.
Surely you wanted to strip for us, ~target~? What other reason would you have to come to a strip poker game?
Your block meter just wasn't working in your favor to~background.time~, ~target~. Don't worry, it happens to all of us!
Don't let this loss get to you, ~target~! Time to turn on a new leaf, and what better way to start it than showing yourself off in a strip poker game!
You weren't hoping to beat the cream of the crop, were you?

Your garden still has some lawnmowers left, ~target~!
... Which is a fancy way to say "you're still not defeated yet, keep going" where I come from.
I can get through your plays like a laser bean. You had no chance this round.
I'm a sunflower superhero that can burst into flames and command vast plant armies to repel zombie hordes, you'll have to do better than that!
Did someone play Brainana against you and made you lose your brain? That was a terrible play!
This lawn is mine.
You gotta give me something to look at, don't you? Make it something good!
You put up a pretty good game, ~target~, but if even I can lose this game, then anyone can!
I hope I'm not too distracting, ~target~. I'd hate to be the reason you lost...
You didn't lose on purpose to join me, ~target~? I wouldn't blame you, this is pretty fun.
Soon you'll be here with me, ~target~! I'm rooting for ya!
Are you sure you're not missing the forest for the trees, ~target~? It's not about getting the best hand, it's about not getting the worst one...
How do ties exactly work here? Where I come from, a tie just means the zombies have the advantage...
Not a tie! There's no "tie" against the zombies, you either win or you lose!
So... What happens here? Does no one strip now? Do we all strip, or...?
That's one less piece of clothing for you! It might not look like much, but it's one step closer to your defeat!
Back where I come from, there's at least three chances for you to block the hits coming your way... So I'm grateful for every little victory I can get.
I'm glad there's no super-block meter in this game...
Take as much thyme as you need, ~name~. Everyone should learn to take it easy, to stop and smell the roses.
Accessorize all you want, ~target~! Everyone should wear whatever they want if it makes them feel good about themselves!
Not too much to go off for me, but you go...
That's not really a sexy thing to take off... Or is it? I'm not really used to what humanoids find attractive...
Just like my goggles, you could've kept that on, don't you think?
Well, a loss is a loss, and that gets me off!
I'll just think of literally anything else in the meantime...
You're doing good lad! Keep it up!
And the game continues! Another round!
I was kind of expecting something bigger, but I guess I'll have to wait a bit more...
Now that that's outta the way, let's keep it going! I wanna see the end of this.
You don't look half-bad without your ~clothing~, ~target~. I guess this wasn't a big loss for you.
Don't worry, ~target~. No one will steal your things while you're here. I'll make sure of it.
Your accessories are safe from zombies, ~target~. That's what I'm here for.
Take your time! I'm used to having to wait in the middle of my games... Mostly because of intrusive ads...
I'll keep trying my best to masturbate, but you'll have to do better than that, alright?
I've got my steamy fantasies to keep me going, so you can be as boring as you want!
Keep making those boring strips all you want. I'm a plant, I know one thing or two about being self-sufficient.
Don't feel pressured to strip more than what you want to, alright? I want you to feel safe and valid here, and if boring stripping is what it takes for it, so be it!
A hero doesn't push others to do things they're not comfortable with like stripping in front of strangers, so I'm okay with you stalling like a coward!

Holy copyright infringement!
Wait, can she do that? Is that allowed? Is that legally allowed?
I know a certain Rose with a magical stick like that one. I'm pretty fond of her...

I hope your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ necessary for your survival, ~target~... Some people think a flower's petals are like clothes, and rip them out to see us "naked."

I'll just patiently wait until you finish taking off your ~clothing~. No need to hurry. It's not like we're under attack of zombies or anything.
I get it! Sometimes you really have to take your time. Plant your sunflowers one at a time, maybe stall with a potato mine or two.

You don't really need your ~clothing~ for protection, right? Where I come from, just a bucket or a pot on your head can protect you from harm...
I really dig your ~clothing~! I'd wear ~clothing.ifPlural(some|one)~ myself if I knew how to get more clothes than these...
All humans should accessorize! You never know when you might get bitten by a zombie and will have to wear those clothes for the rest of your afterlife...
I get why humans wear so much clothing all the time. You only get one brain, you gotta put as many clothes between you and the zombies to protect it.
Other plants used to make fun of me for wearing this shirt. Now I see you wearing your ~clothing~ so freely, it reminds me that you should wear whatever makes you happy!
Take all the time that you need. I'm used to waiting in the middle of my games... mostly because of ads...

Hey, ~player~! You're gonna join the fight against the zombies, right? If you do, send me your ID so we can train together!

Soooo, ~player~. What kind of garden hose setting do you prefer? There's center, shower, flat, jet, mist, soaker...
Here's a quick tip. If you're depenent on meds to keep you going, stock up on them! You never know when a zombie invasion might break out.
Have you ever played tennis? If you're in the middle of a zombie apocalypse, you're gonna be bashing a lot of heads, so you better get used to that tennis elbow...

We had a lot of fun taking off our clothes today, didnt't we? If this were a zombie apocalypse, always remember, the only clothes you need are enough so the bites won't get to ya. Leather jackets, a few layers of heavy clothes, or just... tape some magazines around you!

A lot of people think surviving a zombie apocalypse needs you to be good at fighting zombies. Not really! You can just run away, or stall them, or find other ways to defend yourself, like growing yourself a really good garden!

This was a pretty fun game, ~player~! If you want to keep having fun with me, why don't you download Plants vs Zombies Heroes from your phone's app store, play the tutorial, earn some gems through daily quests and ad watching, and then search through the internet for videos showing the step by step process on how to dowload and modify the game's files, specifically with the modified card_data_172 file, so you can put it on the game's folder to make all the recommended decks cost only 10-20 gems each, so you can have access to several of the most powerful cards and deck archetypes of the game without spending a single penny and not contributing to Electronic Arts' butchering of my franchise?

If you're afraid of a potential zombie apocalypse, you need all the info that you can get! Remember that gas goes bad, tires deflate and the rubber gaskets in cars rot! Cars will be good for a while, but after that you better get horses or bikes!

Now that I think about it, I've fought all kinds of zombie animals lately. Parrots, seagulls, chickens, dinosaurs, weasels, dolphins... Though I've heard dolphins are pretty bad even when they're alive.

Let me give you an advice straight from the Tree of Wisdom! If you've got unspent sun, you should be planting more Sunflowers on the front! We're no nuts, but against the zombie hordes, every bite counts! And if we survive, we keep on giving sun! That's a win/win!
You better get in touch with your green thumb, you know. Once the apocalypse hits, plants will always be around to help you out, if you know how to best use them to suits your needs.
When it comes to dealing with the zombie hordes, I'm always at the top of the game!
Sorry, undeadies, but you're gonna stay under the ground this time. Plants win!
